data.text:
Thank you to
@AmericanAir for
treating me with
respect and dignity
with regards to my
disability. Staff couldn't
have been kinder. Too
bad #DeltaAirlines
doesn't know how to
treat passengers with
disabilities and show
the same level of care &
kindness. @Delta flight
attendants

“Normalizing the term profound autism will help families more efficiently access the supports and services they need, giving people the best chance to live fulfilling lives with dignity.”

🧩 🧩 🧩 🧩 🧩 🧩

Anyone who believes that #autism isn’t a disability hasn’t met my son.🧡 https://t.co/9hmOSQGSZ7

Asiati is one of more than a billion people in the world with some form of disability. That's 15% of the world's population.

Everyone deserves to live with dignity. #EveryoneIncluded #IDPWD21 https://t.co/ArEOKjDjQ5

As I celebrate another year of life, I have chosen to support @JoniandFriends. Joni was the 2019 award recipient at the @CriswellCollege Legacy Awards Gala. They envision a world where every person with a disability finds hope, dignity, and their place in the body of Christ. https://t.co/1FZzG58ylJ

@OctopusGilded My biggest recommendation is talking to a few people from the community you wish to add. Ask them what would a good character with that disability be, then also treat them like a normal character with dignity. Most people are more than just the disability. So that's important.

It's the biggest increase I've gotten since being disabled in 2003. But, on my end, calling it "massive" is a stretch. Increases have never kept up with true cost of living, neither will this. I'll barely break $1k/mo. Every year I lose more. There's no dignity on disability. https://t.co/7SDcPSJtRd

I don’t get it, like say someone gets $900 a month on disability. That’s $10,800 a year. That’s what some of these officers are getting a month after terrorizing us.  I don’t understand how don’t have UBI and treat poor, disabled with respect and dignity. 😡

Wealth and income should not determine whether someone can age and live with dignity. Whether you are a senior, a person with a disability, or a family caregiver – everyone deserves to be able to take care of their family and age in place. #HCBS #CareCantWait #BuildBackBetter

“Activists are succeeding in extending the disability rights revolution in the interest of fundamental human rights and dignity.” #CareCantWait that’s why we are all working together https://t.co/FAnR3ZT5J1

"100% of the human race will become disabled either permanently or temporary." I have been saying this since I can remember. Treat us with respect and dignity. Remember one day you will join us and we will welcome you. The disability community is strong and we have awsome allies.
I LOVE flying with @united. They have treated me with dignity and made flying with a disability enjoyable. Thank you!

Glad to see these areas referenced specifically: “the freedom and dignity of human beings, the rights of a free and independent press, the right to thrive in society without facing discrimination on the basis of race, ethnicity, gender, sexual identity, disability, or religion.”

Honored to attend ADA Day at Copley Square Park w/  @DisabilityBOS Commissioner Kristen McCosh & @MayorKimJaney. We will continue to work together to ensure accessibility, inclusion, respect & dignity for persons with disabilities. Disability rights are human rights! #bospoli https://t.co/4QVb5WtYGF

Unless they INCREASE SSI and SSDI "benefit" levels ($$$) SIGNIFICANTLY "living with dignity" is not possible.

 https://t.co/1opLCRbzda

Being in support of ND don’t take away my disability. Don’t make my disability disappear it just make so people can try use assumption of my abilities and dismiss my pleas for all people with IDD all have rights respected be treated with respect and dignity! https://t.co/dYzNfs2syO

Disability rights are human rights, and Nebraska must ensure that children with disabilities can apply for waivers and get the care they need.

Leadership means standing up to recognize the dignity of all our neighbors. Thank you to all who stand with us! https://t.co/hb0ofWSEFp

@dyllyp It’s different but similar to a lot of how disability is portrayed. This man deserves dignity and that image is not it. 

I’m so sorry.

People. @CripCampFilm is breathtaking. The intersection of disability rights, education, gay rights, unions, and black American rights. Protest, disruption, refusing to say “thank you” and “please” when the goal is dignity, and the borrowed phrase, “I am.”

Yes indeed it is the beginning of a movement & about time. People living with a disability ESP children in #afg deserve dignity & respect and opportunities to help them thrive. #fatimakhalilschool @EnabledChildren https://t.co/lN9qc66Zol
Disabled people deserve to live with dignity instead of crushing poverty. Please take 2 minutes to let President Biden know that you support strengthening SSI. #Disability https://t.co/qfGKt5x6Gw

March is disability awareness month.  Spread the Word day is TODAY!

Spread the Word Awareness Campaign (formerly known as R-word campaign) Respectful and inclusive language is essential to the movement for the dignity and humanity of people with intellectual disabilities. https://t.co/zHE86Auejt
That doesn’t give you the right to abuse others because you have a disability.  Humans have the right to safety, our own dignity, even though you have a disability. Period.

@FDRMemorial Hey Franklin! You da man! Every single day you inspire me to be a better person! The way you saved the nation from depression and the world from tyranny, all the while living with dignity and your disability, is a lesson to ANYONE on how to live a proud life!

That. Was. Incredible. 

Never been more proud to hear a woman and a man speak with respect and dignity. USA! I truly feel represented now as a gay man and a person with a disability.  ❤️

#KamalaHarrisVP #JOEBIDEN2020

...a country is only as strong as its weakest citizen, that education is a fundamental investment in our kids future. I ask you to vote like your child has a disability, like your brother is gay, vote for friends who are black and brown, vote like human dignity is at stake #VOTE

@notanautismmom @lauralovesian1 “Alongside” meaning anti-ND parents  frame their children’s disability as a burden only, & get angry when #neurodiversity proponents insist their children be treated as humans with rights & dignity—including the right to privacy. Another essay on this: 

https://t.co/8qvRv9CcOO

@EphraimGopin I don't see disability as something to feel less dignified over; the idea that I would need person first language for dignity drives home that abeled people see disability as undignified.

@washingtonweek @lauracastrox3 Joe Biden: The Latino community is a core part of the American story, their contributions are evident in every part of society. As president, everyone will be treated with dignity, no matter their race, gender, sexual orientation, religion, or disability. Everyone means everyone.

These episodes do odd things with disability. In one, we get the quiet, even gruff dignity of a blind woman. In the other, disability as otherworldly.
I have a weak background in disability studies (I need to work on this). I’d love to hear what a more knowledgeable person thinks

This is disgusting and yet another example of why people with disabilities are constantly fighting for their agency and dignity. @SteveScalise MUST delete this tweet and apologize to the entire disability community #CripTheVote https://t.co/8ajxRQmoUG
https://t.co/aZsRAGfAuU @Facebook @Google @AP @NationalAPSE @NDRNadvocates @KesslerFdn @SDI_Disability @LurieInstitute @BBISyracuse

All the feels watching @SenDuckworth @TammyforIL highlight @JoeBiden’s respect for the “dignity of every human being” during @DemConvention Disability Council. Three cheers also for zooming from her kitchen and mentioning access to jobs and living a full life!!!  #DemConvention https://t.co/992QaBnpW9

The Americans with Disabilities Act has protected us for 30 years today. We need these protections to guard against discrimination, ensuring the vulnerable live with dignity & can thrive

#ADA30 #ADAanniversary #ThanksToTheADA #insulin4all #insulin #diabetes #disability https://t.co/wDDtBc355G

For every person who dies from Covid19, there will be at least one who recovers with a permanent disability or functional loss. This isn't their fault. We need a health care, shelter, food program to help these walking wounded Americans live out their lives with dignity. https://t.co/d4EDurHWpT

Just remember that you may think something is lazy but it might be helping someone with a disability (like limited hand mobility to chop those onions) gain the dignity they deserve in self-reliance. https://t.co/Wu6dFPfqz1 https://t.co/TrDnXGEXeX
Excellent @Forbes Article about the dignity of risk under the #COVID19 Pandemic from a #Disability perspective https://t.co/fHPGCKxFG5
We Need Ethical Standards for Journalists Writing About Autism and Disability https://t.co/nqeOpXhDRo give them human dignity!

WHY deny deny deny till dead? He has served on Navy ships with asbestos, he was at Lejeune with TCE/PCE soil and water contamination. This man is 64 yrs old. He deserves his benefits, his disability pay, and dignity @SecWilkie @DeptVetAffairs

Marilyn is a Twitter legend. She’s one of the reasons I say #NotMeUs She has a work related disability and all she wants to do is retire with dignity. Please read her story and donate if you’re able https://t.co/vVfZHM7YCW

I’m especially proud of this work. Every resident should be able to vote comfortably, privately, and with dignity. A special thanks to #BedfordMA resident and Disability Commission all-star, Howard Sumner, for bringing this important issue to light. https://t.co/7vwOkS4lBQ

my father born 1899, a  WWI Veteran, and of course Jacobs is my family name. We need Brother's keepers restore our dignity and honor with approved  housing and approve my MST disability claim. Thank you. EMAIL: johnangusjacobs@gmail.com and cell: 336-253-1545 or msg: 336-446-9492

THIS is an example of how disability should be described when sharenting. Not deficit based. Not parent pity. Not ableist tropes or reinforcing stereotypes. No images or exposure of the child that violates their dignity and personhood. No icky martyrdom.#sharenting #disability https://t.co/boQzxqnLXr

As a member of the human family, you possess infinite dignity and worth. No circumstance, no disability, no mental health issue diminishes one ounce of your dignity. If you need help, esp. if you’re facing a persistent health challenge, you are not alone. https://t.co/PpBixpDJ0C

"That's a sore spot in the disability community..very quick to talk about cute, disabled children, but when those children grow up, being v reluctant to provide supports and services in order to be able to have a life with dignity and independence"  --@aneeman

"instead of trying to cut social security, we must expand social security so that every senior citizen in this country can live with the dignity they deserve and every American with a disability can live with the security they need."

“Bernie believes that, as a nation, we have a moral responsibility to ensure that all Americans have the support they need to live with dignity.

Disability rights will factor into virtually every area of policy-making in a Bernie Sanders administration.” #CripTheVote https://t.co/tcb2VdMpPb

@OdietamoLives @USATODAY @AaronWorthing Oh right, I forgot. It's "ancient" because since that time, Trump has exhibited such class, dignity, outstanding moral character & integrity. So nah, him looking like an unstable idiot as he mocked the reporter with a disability wasn't indicative of a pattern of behavior to..

I for one, Melissa, have so enjoyed your upbeat & cheerful perspective, particularly when dealing w/your disability. You’ve consistently exhibited grace & dignity, along with being FUN!
Here’s to you & all your dreams coming true, Melissa🌟
#TheView 
#beautifulsoul https://t.co/yWsVrBMjOc

@WelcomeToDot Is that @StopandShop on Newport Ave? My uncle Kevin Hanley, a man with intellectual disability resulting from a brain injury at birth, worked as a bagger there for over 2 decades. That work gives Kev + others like him a life of dignity and financial independence. I ❤️ Stop&Shop!
Have you seen this??? https://t.co/vbfuR8voyC #doggiedaycare #Disability #Job #dignity #animallover #dogs
I'm raising money for My Dignity and Mental Health and Healing. Click to Donate:  https://t.co/O8Mxz2135D via @gofundme
I'm raising money for My Dignity and Mental Health and Healing. Click to Donate:  https://t.co/LO3OkpluV0 via @gofundme

NEW: @JulianCastro’s People First Disability Policy

“Everyone has dignity”

“The policy aims to build upon the civil rights established in the Americans With Disabilities Act”

via @wendyluwrites https://t.co/zG5WnxJvcM

Honored to attend and speak at the 8th Annual Disability Mentoring Day @ Boston City Hall.  Thanks to the tremendous leadership of @DisabilityBOS Comm. McCosh, Mayor @marty_walsh and @MassRehabComm in ensuring persons with disabilities are treated with respect & dignity. #bospoli https://t.co/ywGfuFQrUF

@OnePlus_USA Heck of a phone if you aren't on disability  and find yourself only window shopping.  We all have our burdens and I guess I can live without one but it would be nice not to depend on what they called Obama phones.  Every program that saps your dignity creates shame.

Disabled people are more than a talking point. There are needs and support required to live with dignity and independence. I am so proud of @BernieSanders for making #disability an important part of his platform. Those not disabled are temporarily able-bodied. #BerniesBack https://t.co/nWN6NEx93Q

@LindseyGrahamSC And civil discourse, fair treatment, including the respect for rights and the dignity of all individuals, regardless of race, ethnicity, national origin, religion, gender, disability, or sexual orientation?

Minnesotans of all abilities deserve to live in safety & dignity. 

Tonight I attended a Disability Forum with @BIAMN_PubPol , @MNStrokeAssoc , and @thearcminnesota with colleagues @SenatorRelph & @LisaDemuthMN. We were touched by the heartfelt stories that were shared. #mnleg https://t.co/GFCCfFEY6M

Great to see all the incredible advocates, providers, legislators,  agency staff & friends today at the #MasterPlanForAging conference. Can’t wait to get to work ensuring that all Californians can age in dignity regardless of income, race, disability, gender, & sexual identity 👊🏼

The best way to honor those who died in the 9-11 attacks is to treat everyone with respect and dignity regardless of their race, religion, gender, age, disability, national origin, sexual orientation.  Feed the hungry, house the homeless, provide medical care to those who cannot
EVERY person deserves to be treated with #dignity, regardless of #age, #ethnicity, #infirmity, or #disability. We are ALL image-bearers of God.

Much ❤️ and gratitude to disability rights advocates who have worked with me on deportation cases. We share common cause - that all humans be seen as humans and treated with dignity. https://t.co/kWPJCFkf1G @LCarterLong @JudyMark1

@michasnots @THR He hijacked happy family celebrations for those he ordered to appear. He mocked honor, this draft dodger who's father bought his FAKE disability as others fought and died for the country.  Trump's father helped that doctor financially for years. Trump hijacked dignity.

@rep_stevewomack You sir are a typical elected #Hypocrite where’s the outrage over the dignity of the Office of the President when he questioned McCains heroism, accused a journalist of being menstrual or mocked a physical disability and questioned the mental capacity of a sitting #SCOTUS

What an amazing event #SVBJWOI for the #LADAorg team to experience as honoree @cvonraesfeld moved the audience with her passion, grace and dignity despite #lupus, disability, and adversity. #WeHaveValue #PatientVoice @LupusMore @Looms4Lupus @Lupus_Chat https://t.co/2H4dImfxMZ
@Wayneblackbur19 Very few are willing to have that dignity anymore. I'm so glad that even with my disability I'm able to do what I can to earn money

We know this. Airlines and airports routinely violate disability rights and dignity, and get away with it @FAANews
https://t.co/P90RGxrBV1 #a11y @PANYNJ and @fly2ohare are 2 biggest violators

@TheLoyalO This is a little scary. My disability is invisible, and I don't mention it on my public profile on FB. I don't share the awful days and nights of pain I have. Do we really have to look helpless? Do we have to lose all our dignity? Would it even matter to these people?

Whether you're the only woman on the board, or a janitor or a farm worker, and no matter your gender, race, religion, sexual orientation, or age, or whether you have a disability or are a veteran—you should be treated fairly, respectfully, and with dignity. #BeHEARD https://t.co/o0YU6AaTT2

@MeghanMcCain Meghan, I can get behind your comments on this. It doesn't matter if the subject is a complete f-ing asshole. It's very Trumpian to make light of another's disability. Be tough, be strong, fight back, but do it with honor and dignity.

We need truly accessible spaces everywhere so we can all have the dignity of being equal human beings. ♿️

Man With Disability Falls Into “Accessible” Toilet [CC] https://t.co/L7d6DR9QqZ via @YouTube

We will always have your back Brothers and Sisters. San Diego City Hall needs to ensure our Firefighters have a death and disability benefit. It’s not too much to ask for risking your lives. Our firefighters deserve some dignity and respect! #solidarity #iaff #Team10 https://t.co/8zqfplU8tZ

Philosophy book-reviews:

— After Injury: A Historical Anatomy of Forgiveness, Resentment and Apology

https://t.co/nyxMF4OwNh

https://t.co/in1ZdbrEy9 https://t.co/oqtzgRRUef

@Publix is a recognized leader in employing @SpecialOlympics athletes and other individuals with disabilities. Thanks for helping to build communities of dignity and respect where opportunity is not limited by disability. https://t.co/7kpIwhUnro

@SeeMiaRoll @DrKaraAyers @RebeccaCokley People have tried that with me, too, and it’s kind of irritating. 

But I do appreciate the opportunity to point out that a better method to deal with disability stigma is to, you know, change the tone of the conversation. Speak about disabled people with dignity instead of pity.

@javachik "Attitudes are the *real* disability."
Also, I think the dignity you get with a social security payment is exaggerated by most Democrats.

@AOC Dignity should be extended to all regardless of race, national, gender, sexual identification, disability, age, creed or color. We all want to be treated with dignity, and “ dignity” to me is not ambiguous.

This is coming from a teenager who has been through all the bullying and pretty much any situation having a disability can put you through, i’m just trying to give first time parents a helpful tip for the sake of their child’s dignity and self respect 💕

Our City owes every worker affected more than delayed and denied disability claims - owes its ailing former schoolchildren the outreach needed to help them connect to available services - and owes civil servants like Linda Mercer the dignity to seek treatment w/o loss of income. https://t.co/cRiwmRkESQ
Dignity and disability do not coexist. But drama? If it’s all I’ve left to work with, by God it’s gonna be good. https://t.co/f03lLN1blr

"Never waiver from #ethical principles."
1) family as foundation, 2) #dignity, and 3) ethical community - Rud and Ann Turnbull
#advocacy #disability #earlychildhood
 #DEC2018Conference
@decsped

I'm a child of the 60s, & I'm tired. I didn't think I'd have to do this again, but I do. I resist for my grandchildren, for the dignity of every individual, for voting rights, civil rights & disability rights & for equality for all women. https://t.co/N5ug9Q85kN

Honored to attend the #AbilitiesExpo today at the BCEC.  Informative workshops and conversations with many from the disability rights community.  Especially enjoyed talking to @DisabilityBOS Commissioner Kristen McCosh & others about compassion, dignity and respect for everyone. https://t.co/dDniO6Bw3Q

@yusufledesma @dwiz882 I’m deaf. I resent this. It’s cruel, callous, & reprehensible. It mocks our entire community for nothing other than our disability.

It reveals a deep disdain for human dignity as brazenly and proudly practiced by a leader so utterly contemptuous of the sanctity of life itself.

To get an education in #Nepal, one boy w #disability crawled between classrooms for 7 school years because his school wasn't accessible for his wheelchair. #Nepal's government should ensure dignity and inclusion in education. New @hrw research+video https://t.co/wYSzjIcXoe https://t.co/jPxnlYzR4k

WHEREAS,  the City of Gaithersburg welcomes all people & recognizes the rights of individuals to live their lives with dignity, free from discrimination based on their faith, race, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender preference, disability or immigration status; and

Congratulations to this beautiful coalition of taxi workers, app drivers, medallion owners, faith leaders, disability advocates, unions, and activists who fought so hard for economic dignity and fairness on NYC streets! #DontstrandNYC https://t.co/cKvpdesL0I

#Cuba The Constitution proposal prohibits any discrimination based on sex, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, ethnic origin, skin color, religious beliefs, disability, national origin or any other distinction  that is harmful to human dignity @CubaMINREX https://t.co/iJiheQi839
@LEAD_Coalition Person-centered dementia care begins with dignity, is enhanced by choice, and is fulfilled by respect.  These eliminate paternalistic care that assumes total disability.

This morning I got to attend Access CNY's Anything that Rolls! Thrilled to roll with the disability community and allies in support of full rights, dignity, and access for all! @ Onondaga… https://t.co/jqi8rb3QNM

@Enough212 @keenanls This will prevent many folks from being awarded SS disability. I fought SS for 4+ years for disability status. It was thanks to an Admin Law Judge at level 3 of appeals process that the fight for dignity ended there.
@laurawbush Thank you Former FLOTUS. Your messages are distributed with dignity and integrity. Something can't be taught to someone without any. And sadly that is a true disability.

Disability Achievement Center is the designated Mid-County Distribution Center for AAAPP's @agingcarefl "Diapers for Dignity" Program.  Your donation of excess incontinence products are greatly appreciated.  If you are in need, come see us! https://t.co/cTSXCo9Bwt

At UN opening session of the CRPD, Special Rapporteur urges the UN to become a "strategic ally" in the full implementation of disability rights.  Each must be able to grow and contribute "in dignity."
pursuing inclusive disability employment for a life of dignity, freedom and respect for all. #ProFellows, #ChangingOurWorld

He should set a standard for integrity and dignity. Not lower it.

@Living_Cities @benhecht Disability equality,knowledge about the current issues at hand. An how to treat everyone with basic human dignity.

Great footage of New York City in 1911, just before cars dominated our streets. So many lessons here, including the ability of someone with a physical disability to walk down the center of a street with dignity. Thanks for sharing @HildaBikes https://t.co/MJ62NzbVEP

A true hero. A man who didn't let a disability make him but show you can go through life with grace, dignity and passion for what you love. RIP Professor. @TheBackStrap @halmos_tracy https://t.co/LdiUfD27gs

While HCRA gave me the warm and fuzzies, it's also in stark contrast to yesterday's SHSS. 

8.3% of Alaskans live with a disability.

9.9% of Alaskans live in poverty.

Both populations are highly vulnerable and overlapping and deserve respect and a right to dignity.

#akleg

Disability-related harassment is unwanted, exploitative or abusive conduct against disabled people which has the purpose or effect of either: violating the dignity, safety, security or autonomy of the person experiencing it, or. creating an intimidating, hostile, degrading

House passed #HR620 yesterday. Senate failed to reach immigration deal. Today’s ep: “Disability Rights are Civil Rights” urges us all to be co-conspirators w/ leaders like @RebeccaCokley and @civilrightsorg @UNITEDWEDREAM in ensuring dignity. @CarlostheCruz @alexbertanades The “dial” is a visual representation of the absurdity of there being a middle ground on how much equality, respect, dignity, etc., we allow another human being based on their sex, color, or disability.

Ohio wants me to be homeless and if they keep denying me they will get there way Ohio disability could care less about people like me they want us to stay depressed they want to take all of our dignity from us #SOTU
"All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights.” #CommitToInclusion #HealthEquity #Disability Rights are #CivilRights https://t.co/reL5mhLqaD

Today is Disability Day.

On this day the public is encouraged to become more aware of the rights, dignity and welfare of disabled people.
@Delta has renewed my faith in humanity. I feel like a 👑while being treated with such dignity and respect as a person with a disAbility
Good morning from the @scrsla 2nd Annual Disability Pride Parade in East LA! 🤗#accessibility #dignity #pride #power💪🏾 https://t.co/noOy6Kadp5
Allow us dignity & agency, appreciate what we create, leave us alone when we want & give us Disability benefits & Medicare. https://t.co/F0jW0JZZ7Z
And everyone is guaranteed the same level of access and dignity on a bus, regardless of income, race, and disability
So, McCain and @realDonaldTrump are both suffering from some type of disability that the whole world wants to ignore? #Retirew/DIGNITY
@realDonaldTrump I am all for reform/tax cuts, but I am on SS disability it saved my dignity and my life. Please don't let me fall Mr President.
Georgia said Yes to dignity, respect and No to hateful speech about disability yesterday #Dignity343 #Thankful Your #Advocacy works https://t.co/ftz7jGJHqT

https://t.co/JHru2Y0wXz
